pkgmetadata.longdescription: pylibrespot-java Python Library===============================version number: 0.1.0author: Justin WongOverview--------A simple library to interface with a librespot-java server.Installation / Usage--------------------To install use pip: $ pip install pylibrespot-javaOr clone the repo: $ git clone https://github.com/uvjustin/pylibrespot-java.git $ python setup.py install Contributing------------TBDExample-------TBD
